name: So Hollow, The Wallow
description:
A bitsy experimental, interactive narrative, connected to a lengthier (turn-based RPG) Entropic Summons, to complement its plain novel form A Snowed Abode (same characters as ES, written in a descriptive format, with an added comedic narration), linked to a shorter, (possibly funnier) action RPG, related to a VN (games all a different story, in the same universe).

Entropic Summons is the medium which has the most narrative so far, its novel half-way there; the action RPG is short (but mostly complete); this bitsy experiment, and the VN are still a prototype.
